page.title: 13Leisure Activities
page.content: Very many leisure activities are more individually based than clubs or organisation orientated, and a list of these activities is a very long one ,both for adults and children. One sample survey produced 37 different types of leisure activity for children and 55 for adults.Many of these can be done individually or in pairs. {Pets }Many hours are taken up by pet care. A survey in one street showed that most homes have pets and though some animals are common there is an enormous variety. e.g. hens kept for economic reasons. More active pastimes include: Karate " I go every Sunday from 1030 to 1230hrs & have 7 belts" (boy age10) Dancing "Every Thursday I go to ballet and have reached grade 3" (girl age9) Roller skating "I get up at 0500 on Saturdays and go roller skating "(Girl age10)
